mapper.select: select order_id, b.book_id, o.quantity, b.ISBN, b.title, b.author from `order` o left join book b on o.book_id = b.book_id where order_id = #{orderId}
select o.order_id, o.book_id, o.quantity, b.ISBN, b.title, b.author from `order` o left join book b on o.book_id = b.book_id where in_warehousing_id = #{inWarehousingId}

select b.title as title, b.ISBN as ISBN, o.quantity as quantity, i.location as location, a.area_name as areaName from `order` o join order_area oa on o.order_id = oa.order_id join book_area ba on oa.book_area_id = ba.book_area_id join book b on ba.book_id = b.book_id join area a on ba.area_id = a.area_id join inventory i on a.inventory_id = i.inventory_id where o.order_id = #{orderId}
select o.order_id, o.book_id, o.quantity, b.ISBN, b.title, b.author from `order` o left join book b on o.book_id = b.book_id where ex_warehousing_id = #{exWarehousingId}
